sample_docs: Home > Mitek NET[X] Letter from the President and CEO Welcome to MITEK NET[X], the next generation of Image Analytics and Pattern Recognition capabilities. MITEK NET[X] is a company wide initiative aimed at providing you, our Customers and Partners, with the broadest web-based recognition capabilities in the industry. The name MITEK NET[X] encapsulates the theme - using the internet, web services and .NET to help you meet new market opportunities and achieve superior results. This initiative, announced February 6, 2007, comprises multiple phases that will be rolled out over several quarters. Ultimately the framework (as described in the schematic below) will be the universal interface to all the technology available from Mitek. New developments and capabilities will augment the overall platform. The Benefits of MITEK NET[x] By delivering a Single API we shorten the learning curve to integrate our capabilities into your application, and we extend the breadth of technology. The framework will use the most recent Microsoft .NET protocol to ensure fast deployment and complete web services and internet compatibility. This API will be released in multiple phases as more and more features are incorporated in to the framework. Client / Server architectures are a thing of the past. With a web-based platform you can achieve the same rich interfaces, and reliable high performance processing. Add to this the reach and accessibility the web provides, and you truly have the ability to produce solutions with faster time to market and lower cost of ownership. Accuracy means labor and cost savings. Mitek has been a leader in pattern recognition for 15 years. Our read rate and accuracy are unsurpassed in the industry. New advances in voting technology, and optimization, ensure that we maintain the highest levels possible. Our Team of Scientists continues to advance the technology with innovation and refined models. Reach and Scalability Through Web Services Today's internet world makes providing access to image analytics and pattern recognition such as signature authentication, hand and machine print character recognition, object location and much more, all very straight forward. Mitek's objective with an ASP initiative is to provide our partners and customers who don't want, or need to have, an in-house technology implementation to be able to reap the same benefits as those who do. Flexibility of Implementation and licensing We know the marketplace has changed and continues to evolve. Rather than offer our suite of technology in a single licensing model; the value proposition of MITEK NET[X] is to provide licensing options that match your integration and architecture preferences. These aspects of technology delivery are aimed at capitalizing on market opportunities that were previously unreachable. Thank you and look for more to come from Mitek NET[X]!

Partners Program Mitek Partners Mitek offers the most advanced and comprehensive tools for application developers to capture and process data from an image. Our Partner Program provides system integrators, value-added resellers, independent software vendors and applications developers software toolkits that are proven, labor-saving solutions for today's information management challenges. Mitek has a range of enterprise licensing programs to fit the needs of developers at every level. Financial Applications and Toolkits Signature verification and forgery detection for check processing, data and document processing. Document capture and forms processing solutions including quality assessment and clean-up. Mitek serves as the single point vendor for Check 21, CAR/LAR and fraud detection. Document & Data Capture and Forms Processing Image recognition and image pre-processing tools for building document capture and leads processing solutions. Signature Verification and Forgery detection for healthcare, insurance, credit cards, publishing and more Contact Us Add value with Mitek's products and services. Home > Mitek Systems has created this privacy statement in order to demonstrate our firm commitment to privacy. The following discloses our information gathering and dissemination practices for this website: http://www.miteksystems.com. We use your IP address to help diagnose problems with our server, and to administer our Web site. Your IP address is used to help identify you and to gather broad demographic information. We use cookies to deliver content specific to your interests. Our site's forms require users to give us contact information (like name and email address) and demographic information (like zip code). We use customer contact information from our forms to send the user information about our company. The customer's contact information is also used to contact the visitor when necessary. Users may opt-out of receiving future mailings; see the choice/opt-out section below. Demographic and profile data is also collected at our site. We use this data to tailor the visitor's experience at our site, showing them content that we think they might be interested in, and displaying the content according to their preferences. This site contains links to other sites. Miteksystems.com is not responsible for the privacy practices or the content of such Web sites. This site has security measures in place to protect the loss, misuse and alteration of the information under our control. Our site provides users the opportunity to opt-out of receiving communications from us, and our partners at the point where we request information about the visitor. This site gives users the following options for removing their information from our database to not receive future communications or to no longer receive our service. You can send e-mail to webmaster@miteksys.com You can call the following telephone number: 858.513.4600 x331 This site gives users the following options for changing and modifying information previously provided. Home > News/Events > Press Releases Mitek Announces Web-Based Check Fraud Detection System Utilizing Advance Image Analytics Fraud Protect™ Web– First Deployment of Mitek NET[X] Technology Platfor m SAN DIEGO, CA., Feb 20, 2007, Mitek Systems, Inc. (OTCBB: MITK; www.miteksystems.com ), a leading provider of Image Analytics and Pattern Recognition software, today announced the availability of FraudProtect™ Web, a next generation release of the company's popular FraudProtect™ System, a check fraud detection application that helps reduce a financial institution's losses related to all check alteration schemes including signature forgery, and modified payee, payor and layout on the item. The new FraudProtect™ Web boasts key advantages in the area of scalability, workflow and interoperability. The web-based platform provides the ability to distribute the analysis of suspicious checks, so payment decisions can be expedited – all through a web browser. Additionally, the system is designed to provide outsource Item Processing Service Providers the ability to securely manage hundreds of financial institutions concurrently. Item Processing trends indicate a continued move towards outsourcing, but until now these providers did not have the ability to provide their customers with an effective and secure suspect item review. "This product and associated offering is the first evidence of the power and extendibility of MITEK NET[X]" said James DeBello. "We see far reaching potential for this application as a service offered for leading item processors." The application features an open architecture, making integration easy with existing transaction based check fraud systems, such as Carreker (being acquired by CheckFree Corporation), and Focus Technologies, which complement this Image Analytics based check fraud technology. "Our customers have found that the FraudProtect™ System yields a return on investment in as little as 6 months, and it also helps with customer retention" said Product Manager Orit Chanukov. "This release will bring productivity improvements which we believe will revolutionize check fraud detection. Banks, and Processors will be able to present suspect checks to the branches for decisioning– instantaneously. That is a win-win for the bank and their customers." The new application remains compatible with the industry leading Item Processing applications from Fidelity National Information Systems (Bankware), Harland Financial Solutions, Jack Henry and Associates, Open Solutions, Metavante Image Solutions, Wausau and others. Existing FraudProtect™ System customers will be able to easily upgrade their current installations to the new FraudProtect™ Web. Beginning this March, Mitek plans to provide free access to a hosted installation of FraudProtect™ Web to enable interested financial institutions to evaluate the product and submit sample checks to test the accuracy and efficacy of the Image Analytics in detecting fraudulent items. About Mitek Systems, Inc. Mitek Systems (OTCBB: MITK; www.miteksystems.com ) is a global leader in Image Analytics and pattern recognition technologies used by financial institutions, life science companies, government agencies and system integrators. The Company develops and markets the most comprehensive suite of intelligent character recognition software used to test, clean, read and authenticate imaged documents and objects. Sold to partners and directly to end users, the Company's software is used in the processing of over 8 billion transactions per year. For more information about Mitek Systems, contact the company at 8911 Balboa Ave., Suite B, San Diego, CA 92123; 858-503-7810 or visit www.miteksystems.com . This news release contains forward-looking statements within the meaning of Section 27A of the Securities Act of 1933 and Section 21E of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, and other expressions of management's belief or opinion that reflect its current understanding or belief with respect to such matters.
